name: @mindconnect/node-red-contrib-mindconnect
description: node red mindconnect node using mindconnect-nodejs library.

scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0  concurrently --raw "npm run node:watch"  "npm run ts:watch "
scripts.doc: typedoc -out docs --excludePrivate --readme ./README.md --target es6 --name node-red-contrib-mindconnect --exclude "**/*+(test-agent|index|.spec|.e2e).ts" && cp -R images docs/images/ && cp CHANGELOG.md docs/CHANGELOG.md
scripts.x86: rm -f Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.X86 >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Content  >> Dockerfile
scripts.x86.coia: rm -f Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.X86 >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Content  >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Siemens >> Dockerfile
scripts.x86.fiddler: rm -f Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.X86 >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Content  >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Fiddler >> Dockerfile
scripts.arm: rm -f Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.ARM >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Content  >> Dockerfile
scripts.arm.coia: rm -f Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.ARM >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Content  >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Siemens >> Dockerfile
scripts.arm.fiddler: rm -f Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.ARM >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Content  >> Dockerfile && cat Dockerfile.Fiddler >> Dockerfile

author: @sn0wcat
